segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, and it's making me angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can the woman not notice the water spilling all over the floor?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger and bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children are being sneaky, trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool; it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should pay more attention to what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is going to be a mess if this continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl waiting for a cookie, looking so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman is so focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should turn off the faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the children don't get into trouble for taking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
